Update all IP.description: Checked, this will also update all WLED devices (IP set in group WLED -- Custom Variables and only for HTTP).

Re Transmit UDP packet.description: UDP protocol fast but not reliable, choose how many time retransmit packet in case of.(max 5)

Use WS.description: Use Websocket connection, mainly to be used for realtime update (will not take care of LoopIP = ignore)

wledIP.description: WLED IP address. If 0.0.0.0 or nul, we will take the one from WLED Params -- variable.DefaultIP

live.description: Checked, WLED will receive data/command from another device (UDP)

on.description: Checked, WLED will put Led On

UDP.description: Checked, will send data thru UDP (improve speed, but no take care of live & on )

UDP Port number.description: If you want to overwrite actual UDP port (set in WLEDSYNC module), put something <> 0

Effect Index.description: ID of the effect. TIP: To see all indexes and names, command 'WLED info' and take a look at modules WLED -- Values

palette.description: ID of the color palette. TIP: To see all palettes and names, command 'WLED info' and take a look at modules WLED -- Values

Group name.description: Group name from where take data (used by SCAnalyzer)

Transition time.description:
Duration of the crossfade between different colors/brightness levels. 
	One unit is 100ms, so a value of 4 results in a transition of 400ms. This applies to just the current API call.
	Not included in state response (used by SCAnalyzer)
